DOC.brief_summary: The study was a three-arm, active-control, multi-centre, parallel group study.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Degarelix One Month Dosing Regimens in Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Main Patients, aged 18 years or over, with histologically proven prostate cancer of all stages in whom endocrine treatment is indicated. Baseline testosterone >1.5 ng/mL. Life expectancy of at least 12 months.
